summary: **E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial** is a 1982 American sci-fi movie directed by Steven Spielberg. It's about a boy named Elliott who befriends an alien left on Earth. Together, they try to find a way to send E.T. home. The film is based on Spielberg's imaginary friend from his childhood. After some rewrites, Universal Pictures bought the script. Shot in 1981, the film became a huge hit, making more money than any other film at the time. It won many awards and is now considered a classic. It was even added to the National Film Registry in 1994 for its cultural importance.
title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
